title: Test bead
Test child
Epic: Website Component & Page Migration
description: Migrate all website components and pages from custom CSS to Tailwind utilities + shadcn components. The website has ~49 components (9 shared, 9 main pages, 20 docs pages, 5 pricing sections, 3 support sections). Each page needs its inline styles and CSS class references converted to Tailwind utilities. Depends on Epic carvd-studio-9 (Website Foundation).

title: Migrate Header, Footer, and shared components
description: Convert Header.tsx to use shadcn NavigationMenu with NavigationMenuList, NavigationMenuItem, NavigationMenuLink. Convert BuyButton.tsx to use shadcn Button. Convert Footer.tsx to use Tailwind utilities for layout. Migrate ScreenshotPlaceholder, ScrollToHash, and SEO components to Tailwind. These shared components appear on every page so they must be migrated first.

title: Migrate HomePage and FeaturesPage
description: Convert HomePage.tsx (hero section, feature highlights, CTA sections, testimonials) and FeaturesPage.tsx (feature grid, screenshots, descriptions) from custom CSS to Tailwind utilities + shadcn Card and Badge. These are the most content-rich pages with complex layouts. Replace all CSS class references with Tailwind utility classes. Use shadcn Card for feature cards. Ensure responsive design is maintained (the current CSS has @media queries for mobile/tablet/desktop).

title: Migrate PricingPage with Card, Table, Accordion
description: Convert PricingPage.tsx and its sub-components: PricingCard.tsx → shadcn Card, PricingFAQ.tsx → shadcn Accordion, CompetitorComparison.tsx → shadcn Table, ValueComparison.tsx → shadcn Card/Table, ROISection.tsx → Tailwind layout. The pricing page is critical for conversion — ensure CTAs are prominent using shadcn Button with the Gold primary color.

title: Migrate DownloadPage, SupportPage, and ChangelogPage
description: Convert DownloadPage.tsx (download links, system requirements), SupportPage.tsx (ContactSection, FAQSection → Accordion, TroubleshootingSection), and ChangelogPage.tsx (version history with badges). Use shadcn Card for download options, Accordion for FAQ, Badge for version/category tags. These are medium-complexity pages with repetitive patterns.

title: Migrate Docs layout: sidebar, navigation, prev/next
description: Convert DocsLayout.tsx to use shadcn Sidebar for the documentation navigation. DocsIndexPage serves as the docs homepage. DocsPrevNext provides sequential navigation between doc pages. The docs sidebar currently uses custom CSS for the navigation tree — replace with shadcn Sidebar with SidebarGroup, SidebarGroupLabel, SidebarMenuItem, SidebarMenuButton. Ensure active page highlighting works. Maintain responsive behavior (sidebar collapses on mobile).

title: Migrate all docs content pages to Tailwind utilities
description: Convert all 17 documentation content pages (QuickStart, FirstProject, Interface, Parts, Stock, Groups, CutLists, Assemblies, Templates, Snapping, Joinery, Shortcuts, Settings, Requirements, Troubleshooting, FAQ) from custom CSS to Tailwind utilities. These pages are primarily content with headings, paragraphs, lists, code blocks, and images. Use Tailwind typography utilities. This is bulk work but straightforward — same pattern for each page.

title: Migrate legal pages and 404 page
description: Convert PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx, TermsPage.tsx, and NotFoundPage.tsx to Tailwind utilities. These are simple text-heavy pages. Use Tailwind prose/typography for legal text. The 404 page is minimal — just a message and button. Quick wins to complete the migration.

title: Epic: Website CSS Cleanup
description: Remove the old index.css (~2165 lines of custom CSS), verify the website build, and run tests. Depends on Epic carvd-studio-10 (Website Migration).

title: Remove old index.css and consolidate website styles
description: Delete or drastically reduce packages/website/src/index.css (currently ~2165 lines of custom CSS). All component styles should now be expressed as Tailwind utilities or shadcn component styles. Keep only: CSS custom property definitions (moved to tailwind.css), Google Fonts imports, any truly global resets not covered by Tailwind's preflight. Verify no components reference old CSS class names.

title: Update website tests and verify build
description: Run the website test suite (cd packages/website && npm test) and fix any failures caused by changed class names or DOM structure. Run npm run build to verify production build succeeds. Check that all pages render correctly (no missing styles, broken layouts). Verify responsive behavior on mobile/tablet/desktop viewports.

title: Website bundle size audit
description: Compare website bundle size before and after migration. Tailwind CSS 4 with tree-shaking should produce a smaller CSS bundle than the 2165-line custom file. Radix UI components add JS but the website has minimal interactivity so the impact should be small. Document final sizes.

title: Epic: Final Integration & Documentation
description: Final pass to ensure both apps are consistent, documentation is updated, and the migration is complete. Depends on Epics carvd-studio-8 (Desktop Cleanup) and carvd-studio-11 (Website Cleanup).

title: Cross-app theme consistency check
description: Verify that the desktop app and website use the same Twilight Studio color palette, spacing scale, and typography. Both should share the same shadcn theming convention. Compare the CSS variable definitions side by side. Ensure dark and light themes are consistent across both apps. Fix any visual discrepancies.

title: Update CLAUDE.md with shadcn patterns and conventions
description: Update CLAUDE.md to reflect the new component architecture. Replace references to .btn CSS classes with shadcn Button variants. Update the Styling section to document shadcn/ui usage. Update the Testing section with shadcn-specific testing patterns (Radix portals, data-state attributes, role-based queries). Update the Performance Guidelines to note Radix UI bundle impact. Add a Components section documenting the shadcn components in use.

title: Final CHANGELOG.md update and migration summary
description: Consolidate all CHANGELOG entries from the migration beads into a clean summary under [Unreleased]. The migration should be documented as a major 'Changed' entry: 'Migrated UI component library to shadcn/ui with Radix UI primitives' for both desktop and website. Include notable improvements: accessibility, keyboard navigation, consistent theming, reduced custom CSS.

title: Epic: Desktop shadcn Foundation
description: Install shadcn/ui in the desktop Electron app, configure theming bridge between Twilight Studio CSS custom properties and shadcn conventions, set up cn() utility and component directory structure. This epic must be completed before any component migration begins.

title: Install shadcn/ui dependencies and configure component.json
description: Install core dependencies: tailwind-merge, clsx, class-variance-authority (cva), and Radix UI primitives. Run 'npx shadcn@latest init' or manually create components.json pointing to packages/desktop/src/renderer/src/components/ui/. Ensure compatibility with Tailwind CSS 4 and electron-vite. Verify the @/ path alias resolves correctly in the Electron renderer process.

title: Create theming bridge - map Twilight Studio CSS vars to shadcn conventions
description: Map existing CSS custom properties (--color-bg, --color-accent, --color-text, etc.) to shadcn's expected variable names (--background, --foreground, --primary, etc.) in tailwind.css. Maintain BOTH naming conventions during migration so old and new components work simultaneously. The Twilight Studio palette (Twilight Indigo, Cerulean, Gold, Lilac Ash, Papaya Whip) must be preserved exactly. Both dark and light themes must continue working. Update @theme inline block accordingly.

title: Set up cn() utility and shadcn component directory structure
description: Create src/renderer/src/lib/utils.ts with the cn() utility (clsx + tailwind-merge). Create src/renderer/src/components/ui/ directory for shadcn components. Verify the path alias works in imports. Add a smoke test for cn() utility.

title: Epic: Desktop Core Primitives Migration
description: Replace the hand-rolled button system (.btn classes in primitives.css), form elements, and base Modal with shadcn equivalents. This is the highest-impact epic — these primitives are used across every component in the app. Each sub-bead must update all consumers AND their tests. Depends on Epic carvd-studio-2 (Foundation) being complete.

title: Migrate Button - replace entire .btn CSS system with shadcn Button
description: Add shadcn Button component. Replace all .btn/.btn-sm/.btn-md/.btn-lg/.btn-filled/.btn-outlined/.btn-ghost/.btn-primary/.btn-secondary/.btn-danger class combinations with shadcn Button variants (variant='default|destructive|outline|secondary|ghost|link', size='default|sm|lg|icon'). Map the Twilight Studio color semantics: btn-primary→default (cerulean), btn-secondary→secondary, btn-danger→destructive. Update ALL button usages across ~95 components. Remove .btn rules from primitives.css after all consumers are migrated. Update all affected tests — button queries may change from class selectors to role selectors.

title: Migrate Input, Textarea, Label - replace form primitives
description: Add shadcn Input, Textarea, and Label components. Replace the .form-group CSS patterns in primitives.css. Migrate src/renderer/src/components/common/form/Input.tsx, TextArea.tsx, and FormField.tsx to use shadcn components internally. The FractionInput component should continue to work (it wraps Input). Update all form-using components (modals, settings, properties panel). Preserve existing validation patterns and field-error styling.

title: Migrate Select - replace custom Select component
description: Add shadcn Select component. Replace src/renderer/src/components/common/form/Select.tsx with shadcn Select (Radix-based, accessible, keyboard navigable). This is a significant UX upgrade — the current select is a styled native <select>. All dropdown selects in modals, settings, and property panels must be migrated. Carefully test that value binding works correctly with Zustand store state.

title: Migrate Checkbox and RadioGroup
description: Add shadcn Checkbox and RadioGroup components. Replace src/renderer/src/components/common/form/Checkbox.tsx and RadioGroup.tsx. Migrate all checkbox/radio usages in settings, modals, and property panels. The existing accent-color styling will be replaced by shadcn's styled checkboxes. Update .checkbox-label and .radio-group CSS classes.

title: Migrate Dialog - replace Modal.tsx base component
description: Add shadcn Dialog component. Replace src/renderer/src/components/common/Modal.tsx which is the base for ALL 17+ modals. The new Dialog must support: custom widths (sm/md/lg/xl/full), close on backdrop click, close on Escape, scroll handling for long content, animated enter/exit. Port the useBackdropClose hook behavior into Dialog's onOpenChange. This is critical infrastructure — all modal sub-beads in Epic 5 depend on this.

title: Migrate Toast/Sonner - replace custom Toast component
description: Add shadcn Sonner (toast) component. Replace src/renderer/src/components/common/Toast.tsx and the toast state in uiStore. Sonner provides a declarative API (toast.success(), toast.error()) that simplifies the current setState-based toast pattern. Migrate all toast.show() calls across the codebase. Remove the custom toast-fade-in animation from tailwind.css.

title: Epic: Desktop Overlay & Navigation Components
description: Replace custom overlay components (ConfirmDialog, context menus, dropdown buttons, tooltips) with shadcn equivalents. These components use Radix UI primitives under the hood, providing better accessibility, keyboard navigation, and positioning. Depends on Epic carvd-studio-3 (Core Primitives).

title: Migrate AlertDialog - replace ConfirmDialog and similar confirmation patterns
description: Add shadcn AlertDialog component. Replace src/renderer/src/components/common/ConfirmDialog.tsx. The current ConfirmDialog supports title, message, confirm/cancel buttons with customizable labels. Map to AlertDialog with AlertDialogTitle, AlertDialogDescription, AlertDialogAction, AlertDialogCancel. Also migrate UnsavedChangesDialog, RecoveryDialog, AssemblyEditingExitDialog, TemplateEditingExitDialog which follow confirmation patterns. Replace window.confirm() calls if any remain.

title: Migrate ContextMenu - all right-click context menus
description: Add shadcn ContextMenu component. Replace src/renderer/src/components/context-menus/ContextMenu.tsx (base) and its consumers: BackgroundContextMenu, PartContextMenu, GuideContextMenu. The current implementation uses fixed positioning with manual click-outside handling. shadcn ContextMenu provides proper Radix positioning, submenus, keyboard navigation, and disabled items. Migrate all menu item definitions and handlers.

title: Migrate DropdownMenu - replace DropdownButton and FileMenu
description: Add shadcn DropdownMenu component. Replace DropdownButton.tsx (generic dropdown trigger+menu) and FileMenu.tsx (File menu with New/Open/Save/Export). Map to DropdownMenu with DropdownMenuTrigger, DropdownMenuContent, DropdownMenuItem, DropdownMenuSeparator. Support keyboard shortcuts display (DropdownMenuShortcut). The FileMenu has nested submenus — use DropdownMenuSub.

title: Migrate Tooltip and Popover - replace HelpTooltip
description: Add shadcn Tooltip and Popover components. Replace the custom HelpTooltip component (help-tooltip-* CSS classes in primitives.css). HelpTooltip has two modes: simple tooltip text and rich popover with links. Map to shadcn Tooltip for simple hints and Popover for rich content. Add TooltipProvider at the app root. Remove help-tooltip CSS classes from primitives.css.

title: Add Badge, Separator, ScrollArea utility components
description: Add shadcn Badge (status indicators, labels in cut list), Separator (dividers replacing border-based separators), and ScrollArea (custom scrollbars replacing the ::-webkit-scrollbar CSS). Badge replaces inline styled spans for status/type indicators. Separator replaces .header-divider and border-t/border-b dividers. ScrollArea replaces the global scrollbar CSS in primitives.css with consistent cross-platform scrollbars. Migrate consumers incrementally.

title: Epic: Desktop Complex Components Migration
description: Migrate data display and layout components: Tabs, Table, Card, Collapsible/Accordion, Progress. These are used in the more complex parts of the UI (CutListModal tabs, settings cards, sidebar collapse). Depends on Epic carvd-studio-3 (Core Primitives).

title: Migrate Tabs - CutListModal, StockLibrary, Settings tabs
description: Add shadcn Tabs component. Replace custom tab implementations in CutListModal (Parts/Diagrams/Shopping/Assemblies tabs), StartScreen (Recents/Favorites tabs), and any settings sections using tab-like navigation. Map to Tabs with TabsList, TabsTrigger, TabsContent. The cut-list-tabs CSS class and related styles should be replaced.

title: Migrate Table - cut list tables and data displays
description: Add shadcn Table component. Replace HTML tables in CutListPartsTab, ShoppingListTab, and CompetitorComparison. Map to Table with TableHeader, TableBody, TableRow, TableHead, TableCell. Preserve column class names (col-qty, col-dimensions, etc.) for test selectors. Style the table to match Twilight Studio theme. Consider sortable columns if applicable.

title: Migrate Card - StartScreen, Settings sections, info displays
description: Add shadcn Card component. Use for StartScreen project cards (recent/favorite projects), settings section containers in AppSettingsModal, and informational displays. Map to Card with CardHeader, CardTitle, CardDescription, CardContent, CardFooter. Also use for stock cards in StockLibraryModal and template cards in TemplateBrowserModal.

title: Migrate Collapsible and Accordion - sidebar sections and joinery
description: Add shadcn Collapsible and Accordion components. Replace the sidebar section collapse (section-header + section-content with grid-template-rows animation) with shadcn Collapsible. Replace the <details>-based collapsible sections (joinery-adjustments, collapsible-section classes in domain.css) with shadcn Accordion. The sidebar currently uses a custom collapse animation — ensure shadcn Collapsible provides equivalent smooth transitions. Remove related CSS from layout.css and domain.css.

title: Migrate Progress and Skeleton - loading states
description: Add shadcn Progress and Skeleton components. Replace ProgressBar.tsx with shadcn Progress. Replace LoadingSpinner.tsx with shadcn Skeleton or keep the spinner animation with shadcn styling. These are used in file loading, export operations, and initial app load. Simple migration — limited consumers.

title: Epic: Desktop Modal Migration
description: Systematically migrate all 17+ modal components from the custom Modal.tsx base to shadcn Dialog. Each modal gets its own sub-bead to keep PRs reviewable. This is the most tedious but straightforward part of the migration — each modal follows the same pattern. Depends on carvd-studio-3.5 (Dialog base) and carvd-studio-3.2 (Input/Textarea/Label).

title: Migrate stock modals: AddStockModal, EditStockModal, StockLibraryModal
description: Convert AddStockModal, EditStockModal, and StockLibraryModal from custom Modal to shadcn Dialog. These modals contain forms (stock name, dimensions, material type, grain direction) — use shadcn Input, Select, Checkbox. StockLibraryModal has a list view with search — consider using ScrollArea and Card for stock items. Maintain all form validation and store interactions.

title: Migrate assembly modals: AddAssemblyModal, SaveAssemblyModal
description: Convert AddAssemblyModal and SaveAssemblyModal from custom Modal to shadcn Dialog. AddAssemblyModal creates assemblies from selection — uses form inputs for name and notes. SaveAssemblyModal saves assemblies to library. Simple form-based modals. Include SaveAssemblyModalWrapper in the migration.

title: Migrate project modals: NewProjectDialog, ProjectSettingsModal, ImportAppStateModal
description: Convert NewProjectDialog (template selection + project name), ProjectSettingsModal (project name, wood species, default dimensions, favorite toggle), and ImportAppStateModal (JSON import) to shadcn Dialog. ProjectSettingsModal has a useEffect for isFavoriteProject — be careful with async state in tests (see known gotcha #7). Preserve the form validation patterns.

title: Migrate AppSettingsModal - largest settings dialog
description: Convert AppSettingsModal and all its section components (AppearanceSection, BehaviorSection, DefaultsSection, DataManagementSection, LicenseSection, SnappingSection, StockConstraintsSection) to shadcn Dialog. This is the most complex modal with 7+ sections, multiple form types, and theme preview. Use shadcn Tabs or navigation for section switching. Each section has different form patterns — use appropriate shadcn form components (Input, Select, Checkbox, RadioGroup, Switch). Maintain the appSettingsStore integration.

title: Migrate CutListModal - complex tabbed modal with tables and diagrams
description: Convert CutListModal (and CutListModalWrapper) to shadcn Dialog with Tabs. This is the most complex modal: 4 tabs (Parts, Diagrams, Shopping, Assemblies), statistical summary, optimization controls, PDF export, stale data warning. Use shadcn Tabs for tab navigation, Table for parts/shopping lists, and preserve the SVG cutting diagrams. CutListStatistics, CutListPartsTab, CutListDiagramsTab, AssembliesTab, ShoppingListTab all need migration. The @media print styles in domain.css must be preserved.

title: Migrate TemplateBrowserModal
description: Convert TemplateBrowserModal to shadcn Dialog. This modal displays a grid of template cards with thumbnails, search, and category filtering. Use shadcn Card for template items, Input for search, and Badge for categories. Maintain the template loading and preview functionality.

title: Migrate license/trial modals and utility dialogs
description: Convert remaining modals: LicenseActivationModal (form with license key input), TrialExpiredModal (informational with upgrade CTA), AboutModal (version info display), RecoveryDialog (recovery options), UnsavedChangesDialog (save/discard/cancel), FileRecoveryModal (auto-recovery), ImportToLibraryDialog (import confirmation). Many of these are simple AlertDialog patterns. Group the simpler ones together for efficiency.

title: Epic: Desktop Layout & Specialized Components
description: Migrate layout infrastructure (sidebar, header, properties panel) and specialized components (banners, tutorials, StartScreen) to use shadcn components. These are structural changes that affect the overall app shell. Depends on Epics carvd-studio-4 (Overlays) and carvd-studio-5 (Complex Components).

title: Migrate Sidebar to shadcn Sidebar + Collapsible
description: Replace the custom sidebar implementation (.sidebar, .sidebar-section, .section-header, .section-content classes in layout.css) with shadcn Sidebar component. The current sidebar has: collapsible sections (Parts, Stocks, Assemblies) with grid-template-rows animation, section search bars, list scrolling, and a bottom settings section. Use SidebarProvider at app root, Sidebar, SidebarContent, SidebarGroup, SidebarGroupLabel. Use Collapsible for section collapse/expand. Preserve the 264px sidebar width and Electron-specific header padding.

title: Migrate Header and Toolbar buttons to shadcn
description: Replace header toolbar button styles (.toolbar, .toolbar-btn, .toolbar-group in layout.css) with shadcn Button variants. Keep the Electron-specific -webkit-app-region: drag/no-drag behavior. The header has: app name, project name, dirty indicator, undo/redo buttons, toolbar buttons, settings gear. Use shadcn Button with Toggle for active states. Keep .header-divider as shadcn Separator.

title: Migrate Properties Panel form controls to shadcn
description: Replace property panel form controls (.property-group styles in domain.css) with shadcn form components. The properties panel shows part dimensions (width, height, depth), position (x, y, z), color picker, grain direction, joinery settings, and notes. Use shadcn Input, Select, Label, and the FractionInput wrapper. The color picker is a native <input type='color'> — wrap with shadcn Popover if desired, or keep native. Remove .property-group CSS from domain.css.

title: Migrate banners to shadcn Alert component
description: Replace AssemblyEditingBanner, TemplateEditingBanner, TrialBanner, and UpdateNotificationBanner with shadcn Alert component. These banners display at the top of the app with informational/warning messages and action buttons. Map to Alert with AlertTitle, AlertDescription. Use variant='default' for info and variant='destructive' for warnings. Include UpgradePrompt in this migration.

title: Migrate tutorial components
description: Migrate WelcomeTutorial, TutorialOverlay, and TutorialTooltip to use shadcn components. WelcomeTutorial is a full-screen overlay — use Dialog or Sheet. TutorialTooltip can use shadcn Tooltip or Popover. TutorialOverlay is a backdrop with positioned highlights — this is highly custom and may need to remain custom with shadcn styling. Focus on using shadcn Button for tutorial actions.

title: Migrate StartScreen layout to shadcn Card and navigation
description: Refactor StartScreen to use shadcn Card for project items (RecentsTab, FavoritesTab), Tabs for switching between recent/favorites, and Button for actions. TemplatesSection should use Card for template previews. The StartScreen is the first thing users see — ensure it looks polished with shadcn components.

title: Epic: Desktop CSS Cleanup & Test Verification
description: Remove obsolete CSS, consolidate theme definitions, update all tests to work with shadcn component patterns, and verify coverage thresholds. This epic ensures the migration is clean and nothing is broken. Depends on Epics carvd-studio-6 (Modal Migration) and carvd-studio-7 (Layout).

title: Remove primitives.css - fully replaced by shadcn components
description: Delete or drastically simplify primitives.css. The button system (.btn-*), form elements (.form-group, .form-actions, .field-error), help tooltip classes, and hotkey hint styles should all be replaced by shadcn components by this point. Verify no components still reference these CSS classes. Keep only truly global base styles (scrollbar theming if not using ScrollArea everywhere, box-sizing reset). Move any remaining styles to tailwind.css @layer base.

title: Simplify layout.css - keep Electron-specific, remove generic
description: Simplify layout.css after sidebar and header migrations. Keep: .app/.app-main layout, -webkit-app-region styles, platform-specific header padding. Remove: .sidebar/.sidebar-section (replaced by shadcn Sidebar), .section-header/.section-content (replaced by Collapsible), .toolbar/.toolbar-btn (replaced by shadcn Button), .section-search (replaced by shadcn Input). Remove .canvas-container if it can be expressed as Tailwind utilities.

title: Simplify domain.css - keep domain-specific only
description: Simplify domain.css after properties panel and collapsible migrations. Remove: .property-group (replaced by shadcn form components), .joinery-adjustments (replaced by Accordion), .collapsible-section (replaced by Collapsible). Keep: @media print styles (essential for PDF export), any truly domain-specific styles that have no shadcn equivalent.

title: Finalize tailwind.css - clean up theming bridge
description: Clean up tailwind.css after all components are migrated. Remove the dual-naming bridge (old --color-* vars that were kept for backward compatibility). Consolidate to either shadcn's naming convention or the project's preferred convention. Ensure both dark and light themes are fully defined. Remove unused @theme inline entries. Remove custom animations that were replaced by shadcn animations (toast-fade-in, modal-fade-in). Keep the Google Fonts import for Nunito Sans.

title: Update all desktop tests and verify coverage thresholds
description: Comprehensive test update pass. shadcn components use Radix UI which renders differently than raw HTML (portals for overlays, data-state attributes, different DOM structure). Update selectors in all ~2675 renderer tests. Key changes: Dialog renders in a portal (use screen.getByRole('dialog')), Button no longer uses .btn classes, Select renders as a Radix popover not native <select>. Run full test suite: npm test. Verify coverage thresholds: statements 91%, branches 82%, functions 90%, lines 91%. Fix any test failures.

title: Bundle size audit and performance verification
description: Run npm run analyze to compare bundle size before and after migration. Radix UI primitives add ~20-40KB gzipped total. Verify that removed custom CSS offsets the added JS. Check that lazy-loaded modals still code-split correctly. Test app startup time. Verify Three.js rendering performance is unaffected (shadcn only touches 2D UI, not the 3D canvas). Document final bundle size in PR description.

title: Epic: Website - Tailwind + shadcn Foundation
description: Install Tailwind CSS 4 and shadcn/ui in the website package (packages/website). The website currently uses ~2165 lines of custom CSS in index.css with no Tailwind. This is a bigger foundational change than the desktop app. Must set up Tailwind, shadcn, theming, and the component directory before any page migration.

title: Install Tailwind CSS 4 + shadcn/ui in website package
description: Add tailwindcss, @tailwindcss/vite to packages/website. Configure vite.config.ts with the Tailwind plugin. Run 'npx shadcn@latest init' in the website package to create components.json. Install dependencies: tailwind-merge, clsx, class-variance-authority. Set up path aliases (@/) in tsconfig.json and vite.config.ts. Create src/components/ui/ directory and src/lib/utils.ts with cn(). Verify the build works: npm run build.

title: Create website theming - map existing CSS vars to Tailwind/shadcn
description: Translate the website's ~100 CSS custom properties from index.css into a Tailwind/shadcn theming setup. Create a new tailwind.css with @import 'tailwindcss', :root variables, and @theme inline mappings. The website shares the Twilight Studio palette with the desktop app — reuse the same color values. The website is dark-theme only currently but should support both themes (matching desktop). Map typography (Roboto/Roboto Slab) to Tailwind font configuration. Create utility classes for the website's spacing scale.

title: Add core shadcn components for website: Button, Card, Badge, NavigationMenu
description: Add the most-needed shadcn components for the website: Button (CTAs, navigation), Card (pricing cards, feature cards), Badge (status indicators), NavigationMenu (header nav), Accordion (FAQ sections), and Separator. These cover ~80% of website UI patterns. Install via npx shadcn@latest add button card badge navigation-menu accordion separator.
